resources.string: Choose a date in the future
You received a message encrypted to the future. You can decrypt it only from the day" "
To decrypt it use the following link:" "
Download the timelock.zone app from https://www.timelock.zone
Timelock.zone message encrypted to the future
No valid ciphertext to share. Before sharing, follow the instructions to encrypt a message to the future.
An error occurred. Unable to encrypt/decrypt.
The encrypted message is not associated to a valid date in the future.
An error occurred. Unable to encrypt/decrypt.

How to encrypt.
1. Choose a date in the future.
2. Click on Encrypt.
The ciphertext will be displayed. Click on it and the ciphertext will be copied to your clipboard.

 How to decrypt.
 1. Paste the ciphertext in the textbox.
 2. Click on decrypt.
 The plaintext will be displayed or you will get an error if the time of decryption is not reached yet.


Sharing.
 Click on the sharing icon to share the ciphertext along with instructions to social media.
